title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: 2 cloves garlic, peeled and left whole
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain the pasta.
In a large skillet, cook the pancetta or bacon over medium heat until crispy. Add the garlic cloves and cook for 1-2 minutes to infuse the oil, then remove the garlic.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, Pecorino Romano, and Parmesan cheese. Season with a pinch of salt and a generous amount of black pepper.

Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet with the pancetta. Remove the skillet from heat and quickly pour in the egg and cheese mixture, tossing rapidly to coat the pasta without scrambling the eggs. Add reserved pasta water a little at a time to achieve a creamy consistency.
Serve immediately, garnished with extra cheese and chopped parsley if desired.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: In a bowl, combine yogurt, lemon juice, oil, garlic, ginger, and spices. Add chicken and marinate for at least 1 hour.
Preheat grill or oven to medium-high heat. Cook chicken until browned and cooked through.
In a saucepan, heat cream and add grilled chicken. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan, garnished with cilantro.
